questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Customer Service to manage its warehouse and customer service department.

The manager wants to improve productivity.

You need to recommend a solution.

Which products should you recommend? To answer, drag the appropriate products to the correct requirements. Each product may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content: Should be correct - same answers from GPT.

According to Chat-GPT:
Omnichannel requires separate workstreams for each channel that is used:

Yes: In Omnichannel for Customer Service, each channel (like chat, SMS, email, etc.) requires its own workstream to manage conversations and routing properly.
When an Omnichannel agent reaches capacity, the agent status shows as available:

No: When an agent reaches their defined capacity limit for handling cases or interactions, their status typically changes to indicate they are unavailable for additional work until they free up capacity.
Call assignments are automatically set to round robin and cannot be changed:

No: Call assignments can be customized. Although round robin is one method of assignment, other options like pick or pull models can be configured depending on the organization’s needs.

comments.content:
"
The workstream can belong to multiple channels of the same type, like multiple chat channels. 
"

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/administer/create-workstreams

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

A company plans to implement a solution to send a survey after a case is closed.

The survey tool must send the survey with the case number, contact name, and results linked to the case record.

You need to create the survey.

Which tools or components should you use for each requirement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADE
Explained by others

B and C are incorrect because Dynamics 365 Customer Voice primarily focuses on gathering and analyzing customer feedback through surveys, forms, and responses. It is not a tool designed for direct posting or managing social media content or sending requests by phone.
So, correct answer is D

There is no way to send survey on social media directly from customer service. It’s possible to create a survey link that can be used on social media but no posting feature available without power automate.

I prefer D answer , use QR code that can be used by participants with their smartphone https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-voice/send-survey-qrcode

questions.question_text:
You create a survey by using Dynamics 365 Customer Voice.

You need to share the survey with customers.

What are three possible ways to achieve this goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.B: Post the survey link on social media from Dynamics 365 Customer Voice.
choices.E: Send an email with the survey link from Dynamics 365 Customer Voice.
choices.A: Embed the survey in a webpage.
choices.C: Have recipients receive a telephone call from Dynamics 365 Customer Voice with the survey.
choices.D: Have recipients open the survey by scanning a QR code from a mobile device.

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Marketing.
You must choose a real-time marketing customer journey type to start the journey.
Which two journey types you can use? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
Given answer correct, keyword is Real-Time

Selected Answer: AB
C is chronological, so not an event.
D is for several regular emails to a lead
